Ruqtaqjicca# satyaqjicca# sEnaqjicca# suqShENaqScAntya#mitraSca dUqrE^^a#mitraSca gaqNaH || 
RuqtaSca# saqtyaSca# dhruqvaSca# dhaqruNa#Sca dhaqrtA ca# vidhaqrtA ca# vidhAraqyaH || 
IqdRukShA#sa EtAqdRukShA#sa Uq ShuNa#H saqdRukShA#saqH prati#sadRukShAsaq Eta#na | 
miqtAsa#Scaq saMmi#tAsaSca na UqtayEq saBa#rasO marutO yaqj~jE aqsminnindraqM daivIqrviSO# maqrutO&nu#vartmAnOq ( ) yathEndraqM daivIqrviSO# maqrutO&nu#vartmAna EqvamiqmaM ~Myaja#mAnaqM daivI$Scaq viSOq mAnu#ShIqScAnu#vartmAnO Bavantu || 26
(aqgAq(gm)q - saqhaqsrAqkShaq - dEqvAqH - saqhasra#dhArAq - matya(gm)#hAq - anu#vartmAnaqH - ShODa#Sa ca) (A5)
